scripts.prepare:celo: mustache networks/celo.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && yarn codegen
scripts.prepare:xdc: mustache networks/xdc.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && yarn codegen
scripts.build: yarn add @gooddollar/goodprotocol@latest --ignore-engines && npm run contract-releases && npm run prepare:celo && graph build
scripts.build:celo: npm run prepare:celo && yarn add @gooddollar/goodprotocol@latest && npm run contract-releases && graph build
scripts.build:xdc: npm run prepare:xdc && yarn add @gooddollar/goodprotocol@latest && npm run contract-releases && graph build
scripts.deploy-local: npm run prepare:celo && graph deploy --node http://localhost:8020/ --ipfs http://localhost:5001 GoodDollar/GoodDollarCelo
scripts.dev: npm run codegen && npm run deploy-local
